name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. System of particles (I)
2. System of particles (II)
3. Rotational motion (I)
4. Rotational motion (II)
5. Review
6. Exam 1
7. Static equilibrium (I)
8. Static equilibrium (II)
9. Fluid motion (I)
10. Fluid motion (II)
11. Exam 2
12. Oscillatory motion (I)
13. Oscillatory motion  (II)
14. Waves (I)
15. Waves (II)
16. Review
17. Exam 3
materials:
教科書: Essential University Physics by Richard Wolfson, 3rd Ed
參考書: Fundamentals of Physics” by Halliday, Rensnick and Walker
              10th Edition, Wiley
